Translation: This house is too big for us.

Morphemic: Fátò àndí-rò kúrà ádɘ́ Álì-yè gárzɘ́nà.
Gloss: house this we-for big Ali-by built
Translation: This house that is big for us was built by Ali.
This house is (too) big for us.
the person that I saw in the market
the person that went to Yerwa today
The person is at the market.
The person (that is) at the large/central market knows Musa.
